Package com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.resilience

Class ResilienceConfiguration

java.lang.Object
com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.resilience.ResilienceConfiguration
public class ResilienceConfiguration extends Object
This type provides options to configure the resilience function decoration.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    ResilienceConfiguration.BulkheadConfiguration
    Provides options specific to bulkheads.

    Provides options specific to caching.

    Provides options specific to circuit breakers.
    static final class 
    ResilienceConfiguration.RateLimiterConfiguration
    Provides options specific to rate limits.
    static final class 
    ResilienceConfiguration.RetryConfiguration
    Provides options specific to retries, which will reattempt failed requests a limited amount of times.
    static final class 
    ResilienceConfiguration.TimeLimiterConfiguration
    Provides options specific to timeouts.

  • Constructor Details

    • ResilienceConfiguration

      protected ResilienceConfiguration(@Nonnull String identifier)
      Constructor for resilience configuration.
      Parameters:
      identifier - A unique identifier for this configuration.

  • Method Details

    • of

      @Nonnull public static ResilienceConfiguration of(@Nonnull String identifier)
      Factory function to create a resilience configuration with default values for the given identifier.

      By default the following resilience features are active with default values:

      Timeouts Enabled
      Circuit Breaker Enabled
      Bulkhead Enabled
      Caching Disabled
      Retries Disabled
      Rate Limiter Disabled

      Parameters:
      identifier - A unique identifier for this configuration.
      Returns:
      A resilience configuration.

    • of

      @Nonnull public static ResilienceConfiguration of(@Nonnull Class<?> serviceClass)
      Factory function to create a resilience configuration with only a subset of resilience features enabled by default.

      By default the following resilience features are active with default values:

      Timeouts Enabled
      Circuit Breaker Enabled
      Bulkhead Enabled
      Caching Disabled
      Retries Disabled
      Rate Limiter Disabled

      Parameters:
      serviceClass - The invoking caller class.
      Returns:
      An new instance of resilience configuration.

    • empty

      @Nonnull public static ResilienceConfiguration empty(@Nonnull String identifier)
      Factory function to create a resilience configuration with all resilience features disabled by default. Enable them explicitly through the setters to only add the functionality that is needed.
      Parameters:
      identifier - A unique identifier for this configuration.
      Returns:
      An empty resilience configuration.

    • empty

      @Nonnull public static ResilienceConfiguration empty(@Nonnull Class<?> serviceClass)
      Factory function to create a resilience configuration with all resilience features disabled by default. Enable them explicitly through the setters to only add the functionality that is needed.
      Parameters:
      serviceClass - The invoking caller class.
      Returns:
      An empty resilience configuration.
